:: Rainchark's leg takes the full onslaught of the attack.  The leg 
is charred and broken.  He would need a new one, and soon.  ::

You  dirty, stupid bot!

:: Turns around and fires 2 missles at Pyrotaur.  It was close range, 
and chances were, they were going to hit. ::
